member_organisations:
Viro tvornica secera d.d. 
Sladorana tvornica secera d.o.o.
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Business and Industry
eu_initiatives: Common Agricultural Policy of the EU in particular CMO Regulation of the Council and EP 1308/2013 about organization of market of agricultural products.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: VIRO is implementing CMO policies of the EU by fulfilling requirements related to reporting (production, price, stocks, sale, trade) in sugar sector. The main body to whom data are reported is the Paying Agency in Croatia. The most recent event organized by VIRO is CEFS congress in June 2017. CEFS is European Association of Sugar Producers.
goals__remit: Viro tvornica secera d.d. (hereinafter: VIRO) is approved sugar producer on the EU market. The main goals are related to sustainable production of sugar and by-products, to create economic value, profit to shareholders, satisfy consumer needs and contribute to local communities.
